body:
### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install aml
==> aml: Executing phase: 'install'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 2:
    'make' '-j16' 'install'

3 errors found in build log:
     916    finished...
     917    sphinx-build -b html -a . ./build-sphinx
     918    Running Sphinx v1.1.3
     919    
     920    Extension error:
     921    Could not import extension breathe (exception: No module named breathe)
  >> 922    make[2]: *** [build-docs] Error 1
     923    make[2]: Leaving directory `/tmp/butler59/spack-stage/spack-stage-aml-0
            .1.0-ducx5e5lfkbny72poxx6iaw74cbtoq43/spack-src/doc'
  >> 924    make[1]: *** [install-am] Error 2
     925    make[1]: Leaving directory `/tmp/butler59/spack-stage/spack-stage-aml-0
            .1.0-ducx5e5lfkbny72poxx6iaw74cbtoq43/spack-src/doc'
  >> 926    make: *** [install-recursive] Error 1
```

### Information on your system

```console
* **Spack:** 0.15.4-624-ebe5a5652c
* **Python:** 3.7.2
* **Platform:** linux-rhel7-broadwell
```

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [ ] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
title: Installation issue: AML
